required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: National Survey on Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD) Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Impact of Abdominal Fat on GERD Severity and GERD Frequency in General Practice

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this observational study is to assess the impact of abdominal fat on severity and frequency of GERD symptoms .

study_pop.textblock: First three consecutive patients with GERD symptoms seen by GP

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or female > or = 18 years old
- Patient with symptomatic GERD
- Without PPI or H2 antagonist treatment during the 3 previous months
- Agree to take part in this study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women

address.city: Arc Et Senans Rc Et Senans
